alert.note: Alert for Northern New London; Southern Middlesex; Southern New London (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 16 at 8:14PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of New London County through 900 PM EDT... At 814 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Waterford, or near New London, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Jewett City, Norwich, New London, Groton, Old Saybrook, Salem, Mystic, Waterford, East Lyme, Ledyard, Griswold, Old Lyme, Westbrook, Preston and Lisbon. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Northern New London; Southern Middlesex; Southern New London
